The great necessity and advantage of preserving our own manufacturies being an answer to a pamphlet intitul'd The honour and advantage of the East-India trade, &c. / by N.C., a weaver of London. N. C., weaver of London. Child, Josiah, Sir, 1630-1699. Great honor and advantage of the East-India trade.
[8], 30 p.
Printed for T. Newborough ..., London : 1697.
Reproduction of original in Columbia University Library.
